top10_tweets_like:
Feel free to use this #ggplot2 cheat sheet to quickly find the right aesthetics for your geoms.

Feedback and improvements welcome #rstats

https://t.co/WmuAC5i5rx https://t.co/0e83VRpvYH

In addition, you can now also set discrete colour/fill scale defaults via a vector (or list) of colour codes. Super useful for providing colour-blind safe defaults! #rstats https://t.co/7AwMsfEv3V https://t.co/jHMPC86pco

Happy to announce that version 0.8.2 of {highcharter} 📦 is on CRAN. We also have a new documentation site https://t.co/ZHgoInQxDe -based on {pkgdown} - with many many examples. Thank you very much to everyone who helped! #rstats
If you’re still using summarise_if() or mutate_if() take look at across() #rstats #r4ds #tidyverse #dplyr #datascience #analytics https://t.co/1Ueee4TSRj
.#rstats trick of the day: Creating a waterfall chart with total geom_text() label ending up in the right spot all depends on an ifelse() statement. https://t.co/zvIf0ZRfK1
